description: This is a convenience wrapper for development, see `web/package.json` instead

scripts.all: fn () { npm --prefix web run all -- $*; }; fn
scripts.install:production: fn () { npm --prefix web run install:production -- $*; }; fn
scripts.audit-production-dependencies: fn () { npm --prefix web run audit-production-dependencies -- $*; }; fn
scripts.dev: fn () { npm --prefix web run dev -- $*; }; fn
scripts.watch: fn () { npm --prefix web run watch -- $*; }; fn
scripts.proxy: fn () { npm --prefix web run proxy -- $*; }; fn
scripts.build: fn () { npm --prefix web run build -- $*; }; fn
scripts.lint: fn () { npm --prefix web run lint -- $*; }; fn
scripts.lint:production: fn () { npm --prefix web run lint:production -- $*; }; fn
scripts.sort-package: fn () { npm --prefix web run sort-package -- $*; }; fn
scripts.test: fn () { npm --prefix web run test -- $*; }; fn
scripts.test:watch: fn () { npm --prefix web run test:watch -- $*; }; fn
scripts.tsc: fn () { npm --prefix web run tsc -- $*; }; fn
scripts.clean: fn () { npm --prefix web run clean -- $*; }; fn
scripts.zip: fn () { npm --prefix web run zip -- $*; }; fn

engines.yarn: Using yarn is deprecated, please use npm instead
